headline: Canadian Solar to Supply 315 MWh Battery Energy Storage in Texas
summary: CSIQ plans to deliver 315 MWh DC of battery storage solutions in Texas and sell up to 2 GWp of high-efficiency solar modules for various Sunraycer projects.

headline: ENPH, NextEnergy Ink Deal to Boost Solar Savings in Netherlands
summary: ENPH teams up with NextEnergy in the Netherlands to help customers get valuable returns from their solar and battery investments.
